summary: Transmute Arrows adds a little spell with the same name. The spell morphs all the arrows you find and don\'t want to eigher ebony, daedra or glass arrows.
descriptionHtml:
Just a little spell i made because i coudn\'t find one with the effect.
Allows you to transmorph 20 arrows each.
20 low value arrows (falmer, forsworn, draugr, iron or steel) to 3-6, 
20 mid value arrows (elven, dwarven or orcish) to 9-14 and 
20 high value arrows (daedra or glass) to 17-22 ebony arrows. 
(There are two alternative files for daedra and glass - some like them more than ebony - don\'t know why^^)


Version 0.3

Well, no real changes, but i got a hint to properly add the skript (thx comradeprozac). I hope it works^^. Actually \"scripts\", the \"c\" makes the magic^^.

Version 0.2

I added a Spell Tome and it should be sold by all adept alteration merchants (there are only two)
One Spell Tome could be found next to the coin purse of an eccentric and forgetful Bosmer in Riften.

Version 0.1

Well just the spell and a Spell Tome, both just by console 
->press << ^/~ >> -> << help \"transmute arrows\" 0 >> -> << player.additem XXXXXXX 1 >> 
(you know how it works)
author: grillNbier
